description: This file defines a login page component for a web application using React and Next.js. It handles user login via email/password and Google OAuth, managing login state and navigation upon success.

methods.name: LoginPage
methods.description: React functional component for the login page, managing email, password, login status, and navigation.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Async function that initiates login with email and password, updates login status, and redirects upon success.
